name: World Commander
description:
Online 2d platformer game which is still in early access.

Venture to conquer other planets and become the best world commander.

Currently, there are few game modes:

-Adventure (playable till chapter 2),

-Resources Gold (3 difficulty level),

-World Boss (only 1).

Player can collect equipment by clearing stage or summoning equipment, and make them stronger by enhancing them.

There are 3 jobs in this game:

1. Warrior (can run 1.5x faster)

2. Ranger (can double jump)

3. Mage (can blink/teleport)

Co-op is still UNPLAYABLE yet.

Game assets (visual and audio) could be completely reworked in the future.
